remarks: Lemma for ~ archiabl :  In case an archimedean group ` W ` admits a smallest positive element ` U ` , then any positive element ` X ` of ` W ` can be written as ` ( n .x. U ) ` with ` n e. NN ` .  Since the reciprocal holds for negative elements, ` W ` is then isomorphic to ` ZZ ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Apr-2018.)
